lines.text: [Nisha is dressing when Rahul bursts in]

[searching her room]
Hey, Nisha, have you seen my cassette? It has a very important music piece on it, I think I left it somewhere in your room... Where the hell is the cassette?
Rahul, you have no manners! Don't you know you're supposed to knock before coming into a room where a girl is dressing?
Girl? What girl?
ME! Stop it, Rahul, I'm serious!
Hey, relax, I know very well that you're a girl! Besides, you also had come into MY room when I had nothing on...
That's different!
How so?
Oh, shut up!
[last lines]
My name is Ajay... yours?...
I'm Nisha...
Nisha... are you married?
WHAT?
[Nisha is shopping for clothes with Rahul, and has draped several possible purchases over him, making Rahul look like a human clothes-hanger]

[talking to a man noticing him]
Are you shopping? Alone? VERY GOOD! Don't ever go shopping with a girl!

[drunk]
Take off my shoes and give me money!
[first lines]
What is love?
Love?... Love is life.
[while Rahul and the troupe celebrate Nisha's birthday, Pooja begs Ajay to tell her about a girl he likes]
Okay, okay, okay... You see that waiter serving water?
[He points to a waiter serving glasses of water]
Yeah?
Well, if he comes here with a glass of water, I'll tell you all about her!
[They watch the waiter - soon, there is only one glass left on his tray... ]
Oh my God... Excuse me, a glass of water please!
That's cheating!
So what? Everything is fair in love and war!
[the waiter brings her a glass of water]

[passes by, takes the glass]
Thank YOU!
HEY!

[laughing]
Everything is fair in love and war!

[singing]
Dil to pagal hai / dil deewana hai... the heart is crazy / the heart is mad...
Hello, fatty, how are you?
Shut up! I'm not fat!

[showing Nisha a shirt she selected and he's tried on]
Okay? Happy?
[Nisha starts laughing at Rahul]
What's so funny?
Where are your jeans?
I won't dance for your play!
So what? We'll get another dancer and replace you!
Ah, go on! There's no dancer as good as I am!
[cut to Pooja dancing]
[standing in the rain]
Pooja... when you laugh...
Listen, I know I look good...
No, when you laugh, it starts to rain...
[He grabs her umbrella and hurls it away]

[dropping Pooja home late]
I hope your uncle is asleep, so we won't have to listen to his singing...
[Pooja laughs]
[Rahul and the troupe celebrate Nisha's birthday]

[at the bar]
Okay, everybody, tequila time!

[coming over]
What are you all drinking?
Tequila!
Can I have a drink?
No, only men are able to drink this stuff! You go back and sit down there!
No, give me a drink!
Hey, Nisha, don't bother us, just go and sit down!
Rahul, today is my birthday...
Oh... happy birthday!
Thank you... I can do whatever I want, eat whatever I want and drink whatever I want, understand?
Nisha... okay, it's your birthday! Waiter, bring one more glass...
[All the members of the troupe line up, glasses ready in their hands]
[Everyone downs three tequilas - and make faces, trying to adjust to the alcohol. Rahul is the only one unaffected by the tequila]

[laughing at Nisha]
Ha! What did I tell you? Girls aren't able to handle this stuff!
[Nisha suddenly starts giggling drunkenly]
One more!

[to himself]
Rahul, you're dead!...

[raving at God and throwing rocks in every direction]
YOU ARE BAD! YOU ARE BAD! What have I ever done to deserve this? You are bad! You are bad!
[Rahul grabs and holds her arms to make her stop]
I'm sorry, Nisha...
Rahul, please don't say sorry, otherwise I'll cry...
I'm sorry, Nisha...
[Nisha slowly sags against Rahul and silently starts crying]
Rahul... Naam toh suna hoga
